item.title: Incidents of Missionary Enterprise; illustrative of the progress of Christianity in heathen countries, and of the researches, sufferings, and adventures of missionaries
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digtised copy of Incidents of Missionary Enterprise; illustrative of the progress of Christianity in heathen countries, and of the researches, sufferings, and adventures of missionaries. Edited by Andrew R. Bonar, author of the 'last days of the martyrs.' Third edition. London: Thomas Nelson, Paternoster Row and Edinburgh.]
